entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY, Kirkland Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:55 a.m. EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning then 40 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
